scenario.name: Truncate site name from : from display SIP field
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 From: <sip:TestSiteName@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Supported: histinfo,join,replaces,sdp-anat,timer Allow: INVITE,ACK,OPTIONS,BYE,CANCEL,SUBSCRIBE,NOTIFY,REFER,INFO,PRACK,PUBLISH User-Agent: Avaya 1010_1020/AV_PP1_4.8.3 (14) AVAYA-SM-6.1.4.0.614003 Avaya CM/R016x.00.1.510.1 Alert-Info: <cid:internal@sv-mevideo.com>;avaya-cm-alert-type=internal Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Min-SE: 180 P-Charging-Vector: icid-value="e1942a8c-db99-4162-b211-2265dacd293f" Session-Expires: 180;refresher=uac Max-Forwards: 70 P-Location: SM;origlocname="B2_video_lab";termlocname="B2_video_lab" Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
